summary: Action films are a popular movie genre full of exciting scenes like chases, fights, and explosions. They became their own genre in the 1980s, but people have been debating what exactly makes a film "action" since then. Some say it's all about the cool visuals, while others think the story is just as important. These movies often mix with other genres, like comedy or sci-fi. Over time, action films have evolved, influenced by different cultures and technology. Despite their popularity, some critics don't like how action films focus more on big stunts than a good story.
title: Action film
